description: Returns a list of CloudWatch Logs Insights queries that are scheduled, running, or have been run recently in this account. You can request all queries or limit it to queries of a specific log group or queries with a certain status.

nested_items.name: queries
nested_items.description: The list of queries that match the request.

nested_items.name: queryLanguage
nested_items.description: The query language used for this query. For more information about the query languages that CloudWatch Logs supports, see Supported query languages.

nested_items.name: queryId
nested_items.description: The unique ID number of this query.

nested_items.name: queryString
nested_items.description: The query string used in this query.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of this query. Possible values are Cancelled, Complete, Failed, Running, Scheduled, and Unknown.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that this query was created.

nested_items.name: logGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the log group scanned by this query.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token for the next set of items to return. The token expires after 24 hours.
